data.title: Ralph Forbes
data.text:
Born: 30-Sep-1896

Birthplace: London, England

Died: 31-Mar-1951

Location of death: Bronx, NY

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Cremated

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: The Hound of the Baskervilles

Mother: Mary Forbes (actress, b. 30-Dec-1879, d. 22-Jul-1974)

Sister: Brenda Forbes (actress, b. 14-Jan-1909, d. 11-Sep-1996)

Wife: Ruth Chatterton (actress, m. 20-Dec-1924, div. 12-Aug-1932)

Wife: Heather Angel (actress, m. 29-Aug-1934, div. 18-Jul-1941)

Wife: Dora Sayers (actress, m. 1946, until his death)
